description: The text label associated with the email field.
The placeholder text displayed inside the email field when it is empty.
Additional text that provides guidance or information about the email field.
If is cheked, the email field must be filled out before submitting the form.
Defines how the mail field behaves based on the value of another field.
Specifies the field that the select field depends on for its disabled state.
Specifies the value of the dependent field that will disable the select field.
